data.name: Alice
data.text: 有一说一PLOS One不是给钱就发吗

data.name: 洞主
data.text: Re Alice: Soga 不过毕竟样本就那么多

data.name: Carol
data.text: Re Alice: PLOS ONE已经让本菜狗大修三次了，最近一次居然说图片里有人，要使用得征得该人的同意，我可去他的吧

post.text:
#性相关#
When it comes to what a sexual partner might want, and the fact that sexual intercourse factors in many things more than just penis size, it’s hard to conduct a true study. Nonetheless, a small paper, published in PLOS One, aimed to deduce women’s “preferred” penis size using 3-D models: 75 women picked from 33 3-D models and the results showed women preferred a penis of slightly larger circumference and length for one-time (length = 6.4 inches, circumference = 5.0 inches) versus long-term (length = 6.3 inches, circumference = 4.8 inches) sexual partners.
注：6.4 inches = 16.25 cm 5.0 inches = 12.7 cm
